content.html: Even more so, no one stays a billionaire without exploiting people. Even if you somehow came into that money honestly, you would have to invest it in capitalist enterprise since the FDIC won’t insure that much if you keep it in the bank.
content.value: Even more so, no one stays a billionaire without exploiting people. Even if you somehow came into that money honestly, you would have to invest it in capitalist enterprise since the FDIC won’t insure that much if you keep it in the bank.
